title: The Joy of flying free
brief_description: Free flight model aeroplanes differ from all others because once they are set in motion, they are under no control from their builders. “The joy of flying free” touches on every aspect of free flight model aviation. It will introduce the novice to this fascinating hobby and delight the enthusiast.
